bCreatePackagePerAsset: Whether to create separate packages for each generated asset. All in map package otherwise
DetailsPercentage: Percentage of details for static mesh proxy
LandscapeExportLOD: Landscape LOD to use for static mesh generation, when not specified 'Max LODLevel' from landscape actor will be used
bBakeFoliageToLandscape: Whether to bake foliage into landscape static mesh texture
bBakeGrassToLandscape: Whether to bake grass into landscape static mesh texture
